info.title: Tab Control
info.description: This is a tab control ui object. It positions tabs on the top of the control.

prop.name: menu
prop.description: The menu prototype used to build the tab menu.

prop.name: editable
prop.description: Defines whether the user can close (remove) tabs.

parameter.name: $editable
parameter.description: Defines whether the user can close (remove) a tab. It is FALSE by default.

parameter.name: $id
parameter.description: The control's id. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $full
parameter.description: Defines whether the tab menu will have 100% width (and the tabs will stretch). It is FALSE by default.

parameter.name: $withBorder
parameter.description: Defines whether the tab control will have visual border. It is TRUE by default.

parameter.name: $header
parameter.description: The header of the menu tab. It can be a string or a DOMElement.

parameter.name: $selected
parameter.description: Defines whether the tab menu item will be trigger focus upon insert. It is FALSE by default.

method.name: getTabberContainer
method.description: Gets the needed items to insert to the tabber through javascript.

parameter.name: $header
parameter.description: The header of the menu tab. It can be a string or a DOMElement.

parameter.name: $navID
parameter.description: The navigation id for the menu navigation.

parameter.name: $selected
parameter.description: Defines whether the tab menu item will be trigger focus upon insert. It is FALSE by default.

method.returndescription: Returns an array of the needed items for the tabber. It contains: ['menuItem']: the menu item to go into the menu bar ['tabPage']: the page to insert into the page pool.

method.name: getTabberPage
method.description: Builds and returns the page body of a tab.

parameter.name: $navID
parameter.description: The navigation id for the menu navigation.

parameter.name: $selected
parameter.description: Defines whether this page will be visible or not. It is FALSE by default.

method.name: getTabberMenuItem
method.description: Creates and returns a tab menu item.

parameter.name: $header
parameter.description: The header of the menu tab. String or DOMElement (span).

parameter.name: $selected
parameter.description: Defines whether the tab menu item will be trigger focus upon insert. It is FALSE by default.
